B

Board - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.model
This class is a wrapper for a grid of Tiles (that is, a 2d array of Tiles) with some useful methods.
Board() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
Initializes a newly created Board so that it is empty
Board(List<RemoteView>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Board
Initializes a newly created Board so that it it is empty and registers the specified remoteViews as observers
BoardEvent - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.network.events
This event is used by the server to notify the clients about some changes happened to a game board
BoardEvent(Tile) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.network.events.BoardEvent
Creates a new BoardEvent, passing 1 Tile object that represent the changes happened to the board
BoardEvent(Tile, Tile) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.network.events.BoardEvent
Creates a new BoardEvent, passing 2 Tile objects that represent the changes happened to the board
BoardEvent(List<Tile>) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.network.events.BoardEvent
Creates a new BoardEvent, passing a list of Tile objects that represent the changes happened to the board
BoardFactory - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.utils
Factory class for Board, used for Dependency Injection when creating a new game
build(Tile) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.AtlasCard
Atlas doesn't actually build with this method, since we need to know if its godpower gets activated first.
build(Tile) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome.
build(Tile) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.CardDecorator
Base decorator does not modify any behaviour of its wrappee.
build(Tile) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.ChronusCard
This method overrides Card#build Its more efficient to override this method rather than attach to Chronus his own decorator.
build(Tile) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.ChronusCardDecorator
This method overrides CardDecorator#build After the wrappee has completed its build phase, we call ChronusCard#checkWinCondition to verify it on the new board state.
build(Tile) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.DemeterCard
Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome.

Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome.
build(Tile) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PrometheusCard
This method overrides Card#build If Prometheus godpower has been used, we call Card#render so that the player can see all possible moves he can take.
build(Tile) - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.model.Playable
Build the specified tile one ETileLevel higher or create a dome.
